verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devaa ! nee thalampulu naa kentho priyamu entho priyamu vaati moththamu daasuda nagu ne nenchi cheppeda goppadi goppadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paataalapu paashamulu nannu arikattagaa aavarinche marana urulu krungi potino devaa krungi potino devaa praardhanalo morrapetta vinitvi naa deena dwani anduke ne paadeda keertincheda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa meediki lechuvaaru nannu bedarincheduvaaru devaa Nee rakshana naa nundi daati poyenane vaaru daatipoye nane vaaru praardhanalo morrapetta vinitivi na deena dwani anduke ne paadeda keertincheda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neeve naa kaapari nantivi kaapu dalalo raaleka yuntini paapinai yundi paapa merugananti shaapa grastuda naiti devaa praardhanalo morrapetta vinitivi naa deena dwani anduke ne paadeda keertincheda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mootha vesina naa morkhathayunu daagi yundina naa paapamunu vippi choopi shikshimpa nantivi kaksha leni naa devaa Kakshaleni naa deva arhatha leni vaadanu Sarvamu poyina vaadanu anduke ne paadeda keertincheda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nenu nee kattadalanu nerchukonu natlunu shrama pondi yunduta naaku melani nerpinchitivi melani nerpinchitivi nee dharma shaastramu naaku priyamu dina mella nenu dyaaninthunu anduke ne paadeda keertincheda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parvathamulu tholagi poyinanu thatharillina mettalu mattamai ottu pettukoni nenu cheppeda vidichipodu nin naadu krupa vidichipodu nin naadu krupa nee vaakhdaanamulakenaa stotramu naa aartha dwanulu naa hrudaya dhyaanam angeekarinchu devaa keertincheda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nenu cheyunadi ipudu neevu eruga jaalavane thelisikonduvu neevu ika munduku naa paripoorna maargamide naa paripoorna maarga mide vintini ne nee swaramu kantinine Nee roopamu Halleluya paadeda keertincheda{/lang-eng}
